description: This file defines a Data Transfer Object (DTO) named NoteUpdateDto used for updating notes in the NotesManagerBackend project. It includes properties for Title and Content, with validation annotations.

classes.name: NoteUpdateDto
classes.description: A DTO class for updating a note, including Title and optional Content properties with validation.
